botanicula is a fun game with unique and quirky characters and beautifully designed gameplay the visual aesthetic is engaging and whimsical drawing players into a wonderful world that feels alive the sound design is excellent complementing the game perfectly and enhancing the overall experience its a short game i finished it in less than 4 hours but it was amazing highly recommended for those looking for an adventurous game
